page.title: 03OUR VILLAGE POLICEMAN.
page.content: P.C.Blogg our village policeman, used to work at Queens Gardens in Hull, he has been in Ferriby 8 months.He works a 28 day rota 7 days on and 2 days off another 7 and 2 days and lastly 7 and 3 days.He has 3 weeks holiday a year, he usually spends one in winter and 2 in summer. He has 2 shifts from 8a.m. to 4p.m. and from 2p.m. to 10p.m..P.C. Blogg comes to school to talk about Road Safety, Say No To Strangers etc.. He likes his job very much, but says it depends on how much work you put in, what joy you get out of being a policeman.His office is on Melton High Road. He usually leaves paper work until a rainy day.He goes around on bicycle usually,but sometimes on foot. He hopes to get a motor bike.Ferriby is a quiet,nearly crime-free village. P.C.Bloggs enjoys his work,because he likes to see the same people daily.
